channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [ENTESB-6097] Invalid ref name: baseline-root-fuse-6.2.1.redhat-117, during the upgrade of the child container
item.description:
During the upgrade containers from 621084 to 621117, we got the following error:

2016-09-12 18:21:53,157 | ERROR | 6.1.1-1-thread-1 | DeploymentAgent                  | 86 - io.fabric8.fabric-agent - 1.2.0.redhat-621117 | Unable to update agent
 
io.fabric8.patch.management.PatchException: Invalid ref name: baseline-root-fuse-6.2.1.redhat-117
 
                at io.fabric8.patch.management.impl.GitPatchManagementServiceImpl.alignTo(GitPatchManagementServiceImpl.java:3104)[99:io.fabric8.patch.patch-management:1.2.0.redhat-621117]
 
                at io.fabric8.agent.DeploymentAgent$11.done(DeploymentAgent.java:700)[86:io.fabric8.fabric-agent:1.2.0.redhat-621117]
 
                at io.fabric8.agent.service.Agent$2.done(Agent.java:352)[86:io.fabric8.fabric-agent:1.2.0.redhat-621117]
 
                at io.fabric8.agent.service.Deployer.deploy(Deployer.java:1010)[86:io.fabric8.fabric-agent:1.2.0.redhat-621117]
 
                at io.fabric8.agent.service.Agent.provision(Agent.java:366)[86:io.fabric8.fabric-agent:1.2.0.redhat-621117]
 
                at io.fabric8.agent.service.Agent.provision(Agent.java:199)[86:io.fabric8.fabric-agent:1.2.0.redhat-621117]
 
                at io.fabric8.agent.DeploymentAgent.doUpdate(DeploymentAgent.java:727)[86:io.fabric8.fabric-agent:1.2.0.redhat-621117]
 
                at io.fabric8.agent.DeploymentAgent$4.run(DeploymentAgent.java:283)[86:io.fabric8.fabric-agent:1.2.0.redhat-621117]
 
                at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Executors.java:511)[:1.8.0_60]
 
                at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:266)[:1.8.0_60]
 
                at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1142)[:1.8.0_60]
 
                at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:617)[:1.8.0_60]
 
                at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)[:1.8.0_60]
 
Caused by: org.eclipse.jgit.api.errors.JGitInternalException: Invalid ref name: baseline-root-fuse-6.2.1.redhat-117
 
                at org.eclipse.jgit.api.ResetCommand.call(ResetCommand.java:160)[99:io.fabric8.patch.patch-management:1.2.0.redhat-621117]
 
                at io.fabric8.patch.management.impl.GitPatchManagementServiceImpl.ensureCorrectContainerHistory(GitPatchManagementServiceImpl.java:2517)[99:io.fabric8.patch.patch-management:1.2.0.redhat-621117]
 
                at io.fabric8.patch.management.impl.GitPatchManagementServiceImpl.alignTo(GitPatchManagementServiceImpl.java:3068)[99:io.fabric8.patch.patch-management:1.2.0.redhat-621117]
 
                ... 12 more
item.summary: Invalid ref name: baseline-root-fuse-6.2.1.redhat-117, during the upgrade of the child container

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Abel BOUCHAMA you may be right that there's something wrong.
We could try to fix it the dumb way - by stopping container, removing FUSE_HOME/patches/* and starting again. Then we can try adding and installing a patch again.
May be related to ENTESB-4482 where patch fails to be added/downloaded, but it's shown in patch:list output.
When installing R4, please follow this procedure first (should be present in documentation).

I tried with Windows 2012R2 and 6.2.1.redhat-083 (same as 084 == GA) to 6.2.1.redhat-164 upgrade without patching the patch mechanism first.
After:

patch:add file:/c:/Dev/jboss-fuse-full-6.2.1.redhat-164.zip

I had correct tags in:

  • c:\Dev\jboss-fuse-6.2.1.redhat-083\patches\.management\history\refs\tags
  • c:\Dev\jboss-fuse-6.2.1.redhat-083\data\git\local\fabric\.git\refs\tags
  • C:\Dev\jboss-fuse-6.2.1.redhat-083\data\git\servlet\fabric\refs\tags (after patch synchronize, because I created fabric after adding a patch)
  • C:\Dev\jboss-fuse-6.2.1.redhat-083\instances\child\data\git\local\fabric\.git\refs\tags
  • C:\Dev\jboss-fuse-6.2.1.redhat-083\instances\child\patches\.management\history\.git\refs\tags

In root logs I saw:

11:22:23,765 | INFO  | lixDispatchQueue | patch-management                 | 1 - io.fabric8.patch.patch-management - 1.2.0.redhat-621083 | Found baseline distribution: C:\Dev\jboss-fuse-6.2.1.redhat-083\system\org\jboss\fuse\jboss-fuse-full\6.2.1.redhat-083\jboss-fuse-full-6.2.1.redhat-083-baseline.zip
 
13:18:22,765 | INFO  | lixDispatchQueue | patch-management                 | 1 - io.fabric8.patch.patch-management - 1.2.0.redhat-621083 | Found Fuse baseline distribution: C:\Dev\jboss-fuse-6.2.1.redhat-083\system\org\jboss\fuse\jboss-fuse-full\6.2.1.redhat-083\jboss-fuse-full-6.2.1.redhat-083-baseline.zip
 
13:18:27,000 | INFO  | lixDispatchQueue | patch-management                 | 1 - io.fabric8.patch.patch-management - 1.2.0.redhat-621083 | Found Fuse baseline distribution: C:\Dev\jboss-fuse-6.2.1.redhat-083\system\org\jboss\fuse\jboss-fuse-full\6.2.1.redhat-164\jboss-fuse-full-6.2.1.redhat-164-baseline.zip
 
13:19:13,031 | INFO  | lixDispatchQueue | patch-management                 | 1 - io.fabric8.patch.patch-management - 1.2.0.redhat-621083 | Found child baseline distribution: C:\Dev\jboss-fuse-6.2.1.redhat-083\system\org\apache\karaf\admin\org.apache.karaf.admin.core\2.4.0.redhat-621083\org.apache.karaf.admin.core-2.4.0.redhat-621083.jar
 
13:19:13,109 | INFO  | lixDispatchQueue | patch-management                 | 1 - io.fabric8.patch.patch-management - 1.2.0.redhat-621083 | Found child baseline distribution: C:\Dev\jboss-fuse-6.2.1.redhat-083\system\org\apache\karaf\admin\org.apache.karaf.admin.core\2.4.0.redhat-621164\org.apache.karaf.admin.core-2.4.0.redhat-621164.jar
 
13:19:17,296 | INFO  | lixDispatchQueue | patch-management                 | 1 - io.fabric8.patch.patch-management - 1.2.0.redhat-621083 | Found SSH baseline distribution: C:\Dev\jboss-fuse-6.2.1.redhat-083\system\io\fabric8\fabric8-karaf\1.2.0.redhat-621083\fabric8-karaf-1.2.0.redhat-621083.zip
 
2016-09-27 13:19:28,546 | INFO  | lixDispatchQueue | patch-management                 | 1 - io.fabric8.patch.patch-management - 1.2.0.redhat-621083 | Found SSH baseline distribution: C:\Dev\jboss-fuse-6.2.1.redhat-083\system\io\fabric8\fabric8-karaf\1.2.0.redhat-621164\fabric8-karaf-1.2.0.redhat-621164.zip

I hope this is the problem... When child container is created it's connecting ${karaf.base}/patches/.management/history git repo with fabric git repo at ${karaf.base}/data/git/local/fabric/.git, but it's happening in parallel with normal fabric git initialization (connection of data/git/local/fabric with fabric-wide repository). I added logging and got this:

2016-12-05 13:02:46,760 | INFO  | lixDispatchQueue | Configuring patch management system
 
2016-12-05 13:02:46,761 | INFO  | lixDispatchQueue | Fetching data from /data/servers/jboss-fuse-6.3.0.redhat-208/instances/child/data/git/local/fabric
 
2016-12-05 13:02:46,789 | INFO  | lixDispatchQueue | Available tags: []
 
2016-12-05 13:02:46,974 | INFO  | lixDispatchQueue | Tag "baseline-child-2.4.0.redhat-630208" is not available in /data/servers/jboss-fuse-6.3.0.redhat-208/instances/child/patches/.management/history/.git, alignment will be performed later.

So I've added extra fetching, so agent can perform it too and I got this:

2016-12-05 13:02:57,494 | INFO  | 8.0.1-1-thread-1 | Fetching data from /data/servers/jboss-fuse-6.3.0.redhat-208/instances/child/data/git/local/fabric
 
2016-12-05 13:02:58,947 | INFO  | 8.0.1-1-thread-1 | Available tags: [baseline-6.3.0.redhat-208, baseline-child-2.4.0.redhat-630208, baseline-root-fuse-6.3.0.redhat-208, baseline-ssh-fabric8-1.2.0.redhat-630208]
 
2016-12-05 13:02:59,818 | INFO  | 8.0.1-1-thread-1 | Storing user changes

I'm pretty sure it'll work.

Also, I provided better patch:fabric-synchronize method that gives better diagnostic messages (in logs, not on console):

2016-12-05 13:59:57,683 | INFO  | Pushed from /data/servers/jboss-fuse-6.3.0.redhat-208/patches/.management/history to /data/servers/jboss-fuse-6.3.0.redhat-208/data/git/local/fabric:
 
2016-12-05 13:59:57,683 | INFO  |  - refs/heads/container-history (UP_TO_DATE)
 
2016-12-05 13:59:57,683 | INFO  |  - refs/heads/patches-admin-child (UP_TO_DATE)
 
2016-12-05 13:59:57,683 | INFO  |  - refs/heads/patches-child (UP_TO_DATE)
 
2016-12-05 13:59:57,683 | INFO  |  - refs/heads/patches-root-amq (UP_TO_DATE)
 
2016-12-05 13:59:57,683 | INFO  |  - refs/heads/patches-root-fuse (UP_TO_DATE)

2016-12-05 13:59:57,683 | INFO  |  - refs/heads/patches-ssh-fuse (UP_TO_DATE)
 
2016-12-05 13:59:57,683 | INFO  |  - refs/tags/baseline-6.3.0.redhat-208 (UP_TO_DATE)
 
2016-12-05 13:59:57,684 | INFO  |  - refs/tags/baseline-child-2.4.0.redhat-630208 (UP_TO_DATE)
 
2016-12-05 13:59:57,684 | INFO  |  - refs/tags/baseline-root-fuse-6.3.0.redhat-208 (UP_TO_DATE)

2016-12-05 13:59:57,699 | INFO  |  - refs/heads/1.0 (UP_TO_DATE)
